General.Name: Jiangsu Aidea Pharmaceutical Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Aidea Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells pharmaceutical products. It offers ainuovirine tablets; urinary protein products, including crude product/intermediate of ulinastatin, urinary kallidinogenase, and urokinase; sennae folium granules; and HIV diagnostic equipment and reagents. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Yangzhou, China.
